context:
High-level Goal: Compare the price of the Uniqlo "Seamless Down Parka" across major US retailers (Uniqlo vs Amazon vs Nordstrom vs eBay)
Sub-task: Open the site search on Uniqlo and search for 'Seamless Down Parka' to find the product page and confirm current price and availability.
Comparison Target: Seamless Down Parka (Uniqlo)
Compare by: price
Websites to compare: https://www.uniqlo.com/us/en/, https://www.amazon.com/, https://www.nordstrom.com/, https://www.ebay.com/

Comparison info gathered so far:
  - uniqlo.com: $149.90 (sale price) — original $179.90
